The ABC's of True Education--All who are engaged in teaching the youth in our schools must have as the foundation of their knowledge the fear of 


                                   -160- 

God, for this is the beginning of wisdom. They may have had years of training, and yet [may] not have touched the very beginning, the ABC of spirituality, the ABC of devotion, the ABC of self-sacrifice. The science of education is to love God, and to keep His commandments. Study the Word of God intelligently. It is the foundation of all education.--Ms. 84, 1901, pp. 1, 2. ("Teachers to Have a Living Experience," August 20, 1901.)
